titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to clarify the exemption from the self-employment tax for termination payments received by former life insurance salesmen.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 5/16/1997--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code and the Social Security Act to exempt from consideration as self-employed income under such Acts specified termination payments received by former life insurance salespeople.
